1.title: Blast from the Past
1.plot: The search for a pair of drug couriers uncovers an assassination plot and a surprising secret that Carrie thought she had put behind her.

2.title: Gut Check
2.plot: Carrie and Al are drafted to transport an embezzlement trial's star witness to Florida.

3.title: Behind the Beat
3.plot: A music student's murder leads Carrie and Al to an illegal nightclub owned by an Albanian mobster.

4.title: Dollar and Scents
4.plot: Following her nose helps Carrie link the murders of a deli employee and a computer hacker to a seductively handsome securities dealer.

5.title: All In
5.plot: Carrie and Al investigate a murder that leads them to Atlantic City, New Jersey, and Carrie runs into an old flame.

6.title: The Return of Eddie
6.plot: The investigation into the murder of a freelance news photographer leads Carrie and Al to suspect it was more than a convenience store robbery gone awry

7.title: We Can Be Heroes
7.plot: Carrie and Al's investigation into young boy's kidnapping exposes a grudge harbored by a college classmate of the child's dad.

8.title: Breathing Space
8.plot: Carrie and Delina work undercover together to try to find a mission to Mars trainee's killer.

9.title: Shelter from the Storm
9.plot: A hurricane forces Carrie and Al to seek refuge in a rundown precinct house and fend off a gang sent to free an elusive drug kingpin.

10.title: Game On
10.plot: Carrie's investigation into the murder of a talented computer programmer exposes a successful businessman's secret.

11.title: About Face
11.plot: A homeless man's accidental death exposes a kidnapping and murder that lead Carrie and Al to investigate a construction company's ties to a multi-state crime spree.

12.title: Bad Company
12.plot: Capt. Russo is a supect in the murder of an informant, leading Carrie and Al into a cat-and-mouse game with a corrupt former cop.

13.title: Paranoid Android
13.plot: The search for a wanted shooter triggers a flashback that conflicts with Carrie's memory; the Major Crimes team uncovers a nefarious conspiracy involving trained killers

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: When a murder reunites former detective Carrie Wells with her old colleague and flame, she must utilize her rare ability to revisit her every memory to catch the killer.

2.title: Heroes
2.plot: When a young boy witnesses a murder, Carrie must put aside the memories of her sister's death to help him lead the police to the killer.

3.title: Check Out Time
3.plot: When a hotel maid is accused of murdering a guest who she says tried to rape her, Carrie takes matters into her own hands to uncover the truth, threatening Al's investigation.

4.title: Up in Flames
4.plot: When a crime scene is destroyed in an explosion moments after Carrie catches a glimpse of the room, her memories become a crucial piece of the investigation.

5.title: With Honor
5.plot: When Al's ex-partner is gunned down and the investigation reveals he may have been a dirty cop, Carrie must decide how to support him without getting too close.

6.title: Friended
6.plot: Carrie and Al's investigation into the murder of a hard-partying heiress takes an unexpected turn when they discover that the woman apparently didn't exist until 18 months earlier.

7.title: Road Block
7.plot: Carrie's investigation into the death of her sister moves forward, but her inability to let go may hinder the search for a missing infant whose father was murdered.

8.title: Lost Things
8.plot: Carrie and Al investigate the death of a public defender, only to discover that the killer has a larger plan which may lead to a second murder.

9.title: Golden Bird
9.plot: Al and Carrie investigate the murder of a teen who seemed to have no enemies. Meanwhile, Carrie looks to her estranged aunt for help with the investigation into her sister's murder.

10.title: Trajectories
10.plot: When a second murder suddenly occurs at an active crime scene, Al and Carrie must wade through hundreds of bystanders to uncover if it was retribution or an unrelated attack.

11.title: Spirited Away
11.plot: When a renowned ghost hunter is killed, Carrie and Al discover that his death is linked to a chilling discovery he made on a recent assignment.

12.title: Butterfly Effect
12.plot: When a construction worker with a promising future is murdered, Carrie and Al wonder if his ties to the mob were the cause of his death or an unrelated coincidence.

13.title: Brotherhood
13.plot: A routine investigation into a college student's death takes a disturbing turn for Carrie when a suspect makes a dangerous move to outwit her memory.

14.title: Carrie's Caller
14.plot: A serial killer with knowledge of Carrie's memory abilities taunts the Queens PD as his list of victims grows.

15.title: The Following Sea
15.plot: During a murder trial in which a real estate mogul is accused of killing his wife, a key witness disappears. Carrie and Al must find the witness and solve the case within 48 hours, or all charges against the defendant will be dismissed.

16.title: Heartbreak
16.plot: A murder victim is found in the middle of a ballpark. The victim is a bank manager involved with a robbery at his bank, while his girlfriend reports he is a good, clean guy to Carrie.

17.title: Blind Alleys
17.plot: Al and Carrie are forced to the sidelines by a negotiator when the father of a suspect that Roe shot takes members of the Queens PD, including Nina, hostage in a desperate quest for justice.

18.title: The Comeback
18.plot: Carrie finds the true identity of her nemesis, Fred, who also gives her not only clues to the current homicide investigation of a tennis player on the comeback trail but also offers a clue in the death of Rachel, Carrie's sister.

19.title: Allegiances
19.plot: Carrie meets Steve's parents and other mob related friends at the opening of his restaurant and is taken off a case because of guilt by association: her romantic friendship with Steve.

20.title: You Are Here
20.plot: The investigation of a research lab fire has the fire marshal reluctant to say the "B" word because the suggestion would mean post 9/11 red tape interference until Carrie tells him where the detonator is she passed in the hallway.

21.title: Endgame
21.plot: Carrie arrives at a murder scene not knowing it was of Walter Morgan, her nemesis who held the clues to the death of Carrie's sister Rachael.

22.title: A Man in the Woods
22.plot: When a murder occurs in Syracuse which mirrors the death of her sister, Carrie and Al travel upstate to confront the suspect. (Elias Koteas guest stars)

1.title: Bigtime
1.plot: After they join the Major Crimes unit, Carrie and Al investigate the kidnapping of a wealthy man's daughter.

2.title: Incognito
2.plot: Carrie goes undercover with a team of bank robbers when The Major Crimes Section gets a lead on the gang's leader, a notorious thief who rarely shows his face. Sendhil Ramamurthy guest stars.

3.title: Day of the Jackie
3.plot: Carrie and Al are unable to discern why a businessman was murdered in his hotel room until it's discovered that his death was collateral damage in a larger plot to assassinate a diplomat.

4.title: Memory Kings
4.plot: When the scientist who helped Carrie understand her memory abilities is murdered, she must track down other people with the same skill in the hopes that one of them holds the key to finding the killer.

5.title: Past Tense
5.plot: Carrie and Al's latest case - the murder of an Afghani cab driver - has the potential to turn into a matter of national security when it's discovered that the victim was a government informant.

6.title: Line Up or Shut Up
6.plot: When a young man is found dead in an expensive sports car he was delivering to a diplomat, each clue leads Carrie and Al to yet another possible motive for the murder.

7.title: Maps & Legends
7.plot: The murder of an urban explorer leads Carrie and Al to not only search for the killer, but to pick up the trail of clues the victim was following on the hunt for a treasure supposedly hidden under the streets of New York.

8.title: Til Death
8.plot: After a wealthy couple is murdered, Carrie and Al pose as a married couple to lure in the killer, who Al believes is linked to a series of unsolved homicides he once investigated.

9.title: Flesh and Blood
9.plot: Carrie catches a deadly assassin who has eluded her before, but must put her personal vendetta aside when it's revealed that the woman has vital information to prevent a terrorist attack on New York City.

10.title: Manhunt
10.plot: Carrie believes the investigation of a district attorney's murder is connected to a man who was falsely accused of raping a young woman in the summer of 2000.

11.title: East of Islip
11.plot: Eliot agrees to let Carrie and Al his house in The Hamptons to investigate the murder of a woman whose body washes up on the beach.

12.title: Omega Hour
12.plot: Eliot and the mayor are trapped in an elevator by a cybercriminal who threatens to send them to their death, forcing Carrie to work from within the building to thwart his plans.

13.title: Reunion
13.plot: When a high school classmate of Carrie's is murdered at her reunion, she must revisit her memories as a teenager for clues to the motive.

1.title: New Hundred
1.plot: The Secret Service enlists Carrie and Al's help when a murder investigation leads them to uncover a counterfeiting ring run by an assassin. Boris Kodjoe guest stars.

2.title: The Combination
2.plot: Carrie and Al investigate the death of a boxer, when he is beaten to death. The clues suggest that the victim hadn't tried to defend himself or fight back against his attacker.

3.title: The Haircut
3.plot: A young ambitious world news reporter turns up dead the day she breaks a big news story implicating a high ranking official in a sex scandal. Carrie and Al both use their connections in high places to access information.

4.title: Cashing Out
4.plot: When Carrie recognizes a murdered city official as someone she played poker with at an underground casino, she puts her career on the line by admitting her illegal activities and volunteers to go back to the tables undercover.

5.title: A Moveable Feast
5.plot: Carrie and Al must find the connection between a murdered coast guard officer, a celebrity chef who threw him out of his restaurant and a missing block of C-4 before the explosives are used.

6.title: Stray Bullet
6.plot: Carrie investigates the books when Al becomes the prime suspect in a murder case of someone he helped put away in the past.

7.title: Throwing Shade
7.plot: Carrie and Al investigate when Elliot's old friend is found dead after a charity event they had all attended. Elliot has trouble in his marriage, and old secrets come out about his "3 amigos" days as a young employee of the mayor's office.

8.title: The Island
8.plot: Carrie and Al's investigation into the death of a college dropout takes a surprising turn when they discover he had been living in an off-the-grid community on an abandoned island near Manhattan.

9.title: Admissions
9.plot: The murder of a CEO leads Carrie and Al to dig into the secrets of students and faculty at an elite prep school where the victim's child attended.

10.title: Fire and Ice
10.plot: Carrie and Al investigate a series of bombings in a Manhattan neighborhood, which may be the work of Muslim terrorists targeting moderate Muslims.

11.title: True Identity
11.plot: Carrie and Al investigate the murder of a high-end matchmaking service employee, but each secret they uncover in the victim's life only serves to create a new possible suspect and motive.

12.title: Moving On
12.plot: Carrie and Al investigate the murder of a movie star found shot to death in his dressing room. The victim had changed his ways, but a meeting with a woman in an out of the way lounge creates suspicion.

13.title: D.O.A.
13.plot: Carrie and Al prevent the poisoning of a US Senator, but in the process Carrie is poisoned with a toxin that affects her memory.

locations: Silvercup Studios - 4222 22nd Street, Long Island City, Queens, New York City, New York, USA::(studio)
Upper West Side, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
Queens, New York City, New York, USA
imdb.title: Unforgettable

other companies.name: New York State Governor's Office for Motion Picture & Television Development

plot: Carrie Wells, a former police detective, has a rare ability to remember virtually everything she experiences including detailed visual recall. She returns to police work and uses her ability to solve crimes.::vhavnal

camera: Arri Alexa, Cooke S4 and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
